headline: Curious about Southern Co. (SO) Q3 Performance? Explore Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of Southern Co. (SO) for the quarter ended September 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.

headline: Southern Company (SO): Assessing Its Valuation as Share Price Continues 2024 Growth
summary: Southern (SO) has caught some investor attention following its recent performance, as shares have edged higher over the past month despite a broader pullback in the utilities sector. The company’s steady revenue and profit growth remain points of interest. See our latest analysis for Southern. Southern’s share price has built on its momentum in 2024, notching a 16.8% year-to-date share price return and extending a strong run that has produced a 61.6% total shareholder return over three years...
